attributes.action: Do not reduced a prison sentence for good behaviour and add time on to a sentence for bad behaviour
attributes.additional_details:
Why should any criminal have their sentence reduced.
A ten year sentence should be a ten year sentence and not reduced because they act in a way which the majority of us regard as normal - Time should be added onto any given sentence if the convicted criminal breaches any of the rules of the justice system or behaves in a way which is not compatible with the way the majority of the law abiding public behave
